card.name: A Good Bit Laid By
card.text: Unique. Thorin specific. Playable if you have stored at least 3 major items at Blue Mountain Dwarf-hold. Your unique Dwarf characters which normally have 2 mind gain 1 mind and are worth 1 mp (to a maximum of 5 extra character points).

card.name: A More or Less Decent Giant
card.graphics: A More or Less Decent Giant.jpg
card.text: Giant. Playable at any non-Haven [H], non- Dark-hold [D] site in a non-Mordor region adjacent to at least 2 Mountain Ranges with a company containing a diplomat (even if the site is tapped). For non-combat purposes his base prowess in considered to be 10. Cannot be duplicated on a given company.

card.name: A New Domain
card.text: Balrog specific. Playable during the site phase on a site where you have played Lord and Usurper. The site becomes one of your Dark-havens [K]. Cannot be duplicated on a given site.

card.name: All This Dwarvish Racket
card.text: Each moving company containing a majority of Dwarves has its hazard limit increased by half the number of Dwarves in the company (round down fractions). Additionally, if Doors of Night is in play, the hazard player may draw an additional card for each Dwarf with a mind less than 6 in a moving company (even this movement/hazard phase). Cannot be duplicated.

card.name: Ambush!
card.text: Playable on a non-detainment hazard creature attack by Orcs, Trolls, Dwarves, Elves, Dúnedain or Men, against a moving company; does not count against the hazard limit. If this is the first attack against the company this turn, attacker chooses defending characters.

card.name: Amon Lanc
card.text: Dwarf-lord specific. As a short-event, playable at Dol Guldur during the site phase. If a minion company is at this site, CvCC is initiated and cannot be canceled. Additionally, you may tap a Dwarf or sage to search your play deck or discard pile for one of the following cards: Pass the Doors of Dol Guldur, Towers Destroyed or any manifestation of Thraín II. As a permanent-event playable on Dol Guldur if Pass the Doors of Dol Guldur or Towers Destroyed are tapped; You receive full mp these cards and if both of above cards are in play, all versions of Dol Guldur become a Border-hold [B] and a Dwarf-hold. Discard this card if Dol Guldur is discarded or returned to its location deck.

card.name: Arda Angered
card.text: Each Pûkel-creature, Rock Fall, and Lava Flow attack has its prowess and strikes increased by 1 (by 2 if Doors of Night is in play). Cannot be duplicated.

card.name: At Your Service
card.text: Dwarf only. One influence check by a Dwarf is modified by half his mind value (round up). Additionally any negative modifications for the Dwarf race are canceled.

card.name: Attack-lord
card.text: Dwarf-lord specific. Leader. +2 EI against Dwarves with a lower prowess and mind. + 1 prowess against Orcs, Trolls and Drakes. tap: give +1 prowess to all Dwarves in his company against one attack (or in CvCC). Cannot be duplicated by a given player unless he has Durin’s Folk in play.

card.name: Attercop! Attercop!
card.text: Playable on a Hobbit facing a strike from a Wolf, Spider or Animal attack. -5 to the strike’s prowess. tIf untapped after this strike, he may tap to face a second strike. If the strike is successful, the resulting body check is modified by +1.

card.name: Balin
card.text: Unique. Manifestation of Balin. Longbeard. Leader. +2 prowess against Orcs and Trolls. +3 EI against Dwarves. If Reconquest of Khazad-dûm is played on him, you may keep 1 more card than normal in your hand. -2 mp if eliminated.

card.name: Balin, Dwarf of All Trades
card.text: Unique. Balin specific. Place this card on Balin if he is in play. If on Balin, tap: during your end-of-turn phase to take any skill card, which Balin could use, from your play deck to your hand. tap: during your organization phase to look at 3 random cards from your opponent’s hand. If any of these cards is a creature playable keyed to your current site or region, you may put the card to the bottom of opponent’s play deck.

attr.value: Dwarves — 3 strikes with 8 prowess (detainment against covert companies that do not contain Elves)

Hidden site. Tap a sage when this site card is revelaed to move there. A Dwarf at this site may discard a Lost Knowledge he controls to make hoard items playable at this site until the end of turn. Petty-dwarves faction may be played at this site.
Dwarves — 3 strikes with 8 prowess (detainment against covert companies that do not contain Elves)

Hidden site. Tap a sage when this site card is revelaed to move there. A Dwarf at this site may discard a Lost Knowledge he controls to make hoard items playable at this site until the end of turn. Petty-dwarves may be played at this site.
If you have a Dwarf sage at this site, you may discard a Reforging from hand or the company to make hoard items playable this turn.
Items (minor*, major*, gold ring) * —battle-gear items only—
A sage in a covert company may tap to shuffle any 1 item with the word 'Dwarf' or 'Dwarven' in its cardtext or title into play deck, from discard pile or sideboard. Tap site if untapped.

card.name: Battle-axe of the Fallen
card.text: Unique. Playable at Ruins of Belegost or Ruins of Nogrod, if the company discards (for no effect) a Lost Knowledge card it controls. Weapon. Warrior only: +3 prowess to a maximum of 9. Dwarf warrior only: +5 against Spawn, Drakes and Dragons (to a maximum of 11). tap: cancel an Undead or Demon attack against the company.

card.name: Bears of the Carrock
card.text: Unique. Playable at Beorn’s House or The Carrock (even if the site is tapped) if the influence check is greater than 9.Standard Modifications: Sprautabern or character with home site Beorn’s House (+3), Beornings (+2). Special: Rotate this card 90° if you play Beorning Skin-changers as a creature, or to cancel Beorning Skin-changers if played against any of your companies. This faction is worth 1 mp for each time rotated (to a maximum of 4).

card.name: Bilbo's Magic Ring
card.text: Unique. Ring. Manifestation of The One Ring. Playable only with a Gold Ring after a test result of 10 or more (+2 if tested at a Shadow-hold [S] or Dark-hold [D], -2 if tested at a Haven [H] or Free-hold [F]). May be used to satisfy the conditions of any manifestation of Gollum, Gollum’s Fate, or The Precious. +3 prowess (up to double the normal prowess), +3 body (to a maximum of 10). +3 to EI. Bearer may make a CC modified by -1 to cancel a strike (except from Undead and Nazgûl attacks). +1 CP to every character in the company. May be tested as a gold ring item. If the result is: 7 or 8, nothing happens; 9 or greater, The One Ring may be played; 6 or less, discard this card.

attr.value: Dwarf-lord specific. This site is a protected Lordhaven. If any of your companies is at this site, all attacks against it are canceled and you receive the stage point. Characters heal here as if in a normal Haven.

card.name: Bolg of the North
card.text: Unique. Manifestation of Bolg. Leader. Only playable if The Witch-king and Lieutenant of Angmar are not in play. Discard on a body check result of 9. +3 EI against Orcs. +1 prowess against Elves and Dwarves. When Bolg of the North is at Mount Gundabad you may keep 1 more card than normal in hand, and all attacks keyed to Mount Gundabad against his company are detainment. Discard if you ever control The Witch-king or Lieutenant of Angmar.

card.name: Bolg, Son of Azog
card.text: Unique. Orc. Manifestation of Bolg. 1 strike. May be played keyed to Gundabad and Mount Gundabad. +1 prowess against Elves and Dwarves. If Doors of Night is in play, may also be played keyed to Angmar, Dragon Gap, Forovirkain, Grey Mountain Narrows, Northern Rhovanion or the Under-leas.

card.name: Borin
card.text: Unique. Ironfist. +1 prowess against Orcs.

card.name: Born within the Mountain's Heart
card.text: Dwarf-lord specific. When you play this card you may bring either a Maker’s Map or a Gangways over the Fire from your sideboard into your play deck; they may be played as if by a Balrog player, and you receive full mp for Maker’s Map. Your Dwarves with a mind of 5 or more may tap to cancel a Pukel-creature attack keyed to an Under-deeps or surface site or a Rock Fall attack against their company. Cannot be duplicated by a given player.

card.name: Call of the Deeps
card.text: Playable on a company containing a majority of Dwarves and a treasure or greater item, which is moving to a non-Dwarf-hold, non-Under-deeps site. Opponent must replace the company’s new site with a site from his site deck that is an Under-deeps site or surface site. The company must be able to legally move to this site (or this card can’t be played); for this purpose, consider movement to an Under-deeps site from a surface site as a 1 region movement.

card.name: Carc
card.text: Unique. Animal. Flying. Playable at any site in Northern Rhovanion. tap: cancel a strike against himself from a non-automatic attack. Discard Carc to allow Information to be played at any Border-hold [B] site in Northern Rhovanion, Southern Rhovanion, Iron Hills, or Dorwinion.

card.name: Children of Aulë
card.text: All Dwarf characters in play gain +1 body. Additionally, any rolls to move between Under-deeps sites is modified by +2 this turn for any company containing a Dwarf. Cannot not be duplicated.

card.name: Clad for War
card.text: All your battle-gear items are worth full mp, ifyou have at least 3 of the 4 types of battle-gear items (weapon, shield, armor and helmet) in play. Cannot be duplicated by a given player.

card.name: Clad in Chain-shirts
card.text: Command. Playable on a Dwarf-leader during the organization phase. Return all other command cards on target leader to your hand when this card is played. -2 to leader’s EI and +1 body to all Dwarves in his company. +2 prowess for every character facing a strike which weapons do not modify. You may return this card to your hand during any organization phase.

card.name: Clan Bonds
card.text: You may bring Dwarf characters into play under GI during your organization phase at any Dwarf-hold (even if your avatar is not there).

card.name: Crimson Hood
card.text: Unique. Helmet. Place this card on Balin ifhe is in play. +1 body to a maximum of 10. +2 EI against Dwarves. Balin may use Pipe as if he were Gandalf.

card.name: Dáin
card.text: Unique. Manifestation of Dain II. Longbeard. Leader. +2 prowess against Orcs, + 1 prowess against Trolls, Drakes and Dragons. +2 EI against Dwarves and Men. If you are Dain, all Man factions playable at sites in Wilderland are worth full mp. If King under the Mountain is played on him it is worth full mp, and when at the site where the Dragon was defeated you may keep 1 more card than normal in your hand. -3 mp if eliminated.

card.name: Dawn Comes Early
card.text: Environment. Playable on a Troll, if The Sun Shone Fiercely or Sun is in play. Troll makes a body check modified by +1 (-1 if he is an Olog-hai or a Half-troll). Failing this check wounds him if unwounded, and eliminates him if already wounded (treat a discard result as failing).

card.name: Dawn Take You All!
card.text: Ritual. Playable on an untapped sage in a company at a non-Underdeeps site (or surface site) during CvCC, if attacked by an overt company and if Gates of Morning is in play. Tap the sage. All Trolls at the same site are immediately wounded and receive -1 prowess for the rest of the turn; Half-trolls and Olog-hai are not wounded, but receive the prowess penalty as well. Sage makes a corruption check modified by -2.

card.name: Deep Mountain Fortress
card.text: Dwarf-lord specific. Playable during the site phase on an Under-deeps Ruins & Lairs [R], which surface site is not a Shadow-hold [S] or Dark-hold [D], if your Dwarf-Lord is there. The company faces an attack: Drake — 2 strikes with 13 prowess. Following the attack, tatap your Dwarf-lord or discard this card. The site becomes one of your Lordhavens and a Dwarf-hold and loses all automatic-attacks. Nothing is considered playable as written on the site card. If one of your companies is at this site, all attacks against it are canceled. All other versions gain an additional automatic-attack: Dwarves — 4 strikes with 8 prowess. This site is never discarded or returned to its location deck. Cannot be duplicated on a given site.

card.name: Desperate Strike
card.text: Warrior only. +4 prowess and -2 body against 1 strike; -1 to warrior’s body. Cannot be played on a wounded character. After the attack, wound the character (no body check is required).

card.name: Dís
card.text: Unique. Longbeard. She may not be among the starting characters. +4 EI against Fili, Frerin, Kili, Thorin II or Thorin III Stonehelm. Discard Dís during your organization phase at a Dwarf-hold to search your play deck or discard pile for any manifestation of Fili, Frerin, Kili, Thorin II or Thorin III Stonehelm: play him at that Dwarf-hold, if enough influence is available to control him (does not count towards the 1 character per turn limit).

card.name: Dry Tunnels
card.text: Playable at the end of the organization phase on a company using Under-deeps movement. River cannot be played on the company’s new site card unless The Reach of Ulmo is in play.

card.name: Durin's Crown
card.text: Unique. Hoard Item. Helmet. Also playable at Moria, if any manifestation of the Balrog of Moria is in play. +3 to bearer’s EI. tap: during your organisation phase if bearer is at a Free-Hold [F], Border-Hold [B] or Ruins & Lairs [R] to bring a Dwarf character into play under bearer’s EI. Character may come from your hand or discard pile. Bearer makes a CC.

card.name: Durang
card.text: Ore. Playable at any Under-deeps site on a Goblin Miner or Dwarf Miner. Discard this card to make Dark Forges playable at an Orc-hold or Reforging playable at a Dwarf-hold (as if Information were playable at the site).

card.name: Durin's Day
card.text: Unique. Dwarf-lord specific. Playable on one of your Dwarf-characters, if he is the highest mind Dwarf in play. Return this card to your hand if a Dwarf with a higher mind enters play. tap: during your end-of-turn phase to take Dragon-lore, Dwarven Hoard, or An Unexpected Party from your discard pile to your hand.

attr.value: Trap — 2 strikes with 8 prowess —weapons do not modify, cannot be canceled—

Dual-site. Hidden site. Unless the company contains a Dwarf you must discard Lost Knowledge to move to this site when it is revealed. Tap a character at this site to take either Ancient Stair or The Iron-pit from your sideboard to your hand.

card.name: Dwarf-chopper
card.text: Unique. Weapon. Axe. Playable at Deep-cleft or any non-Darkhaven [K] Under-deeps site. +2 prowess to a maximum of 9 (+4 against Dwarves to a maximum of 10). Orc-leader only: +2 EI against Orcs. Hurog only: tap: face a Dwarf-attack as if he were a single character company.

card.name: Dwarven Alchemist
card.text: Dwarf-lord specific. Playable on one of your Dwarf characters at one of your Lordhavens (or in your starting company). This character requires only 4 points of influence to control and may only be controlled by GI or your Dwarf-lord. Character gains the sage skill. ta If at a Dwarf-hold, bearer may tap during your organization phase to place a technology special item or a minor item with a healing effect with any character at the site. The recipient need not tap to receive this item and the item may be taken from your discard pile or hand. Cannot be duplicated by a given player.p

card.name: Dwarven Armory
card.text: Playable if you have at least 2 Dwarf characters in play. Place up to 3 of the following items under Dwarven Armory from your hand, sideboard or discard pile when you play this card: Dwarven Chain-shirt, Miner’s Pick, or Shield of Iron-bound Ash. If any of your companies is at a Dwarf-hold, you may discard this card to play these items with the company (you need not tap these characters or the site).

card.name: Dwarven Art of War
card.text: Command. Playable on a Dwarf-leader during the organization phase. Return all other command cards on target leader to your hand when this card is played. -2 to leader’s EI: +1 to CC mady by Dwarves in his company bearing a battle-gear item (+2 if a hoard item). You may return this card to your hand during any organization phase.

card.name: Dwarven Chain-shirt
card.text: Armor. Playable only after succesfully influencing a Dwarf-faction or bringing a Dwarf character into play (also during the organization phase). Dwarf only: +1 body to a maximum of 8. May also be played as a minion resource card that is only playable by a character in a covert company.

card.name: Dwarven Fire
card.text: Technology. Playable by a Dwarf sage at a tapped or untapped Dwarf-hold. This item may be placed at any Dwarf-hold to create an automatic-attack against all other player’s companies: Flame Trap — 3 strikes with 9 prowess (weapons do not modify and cannot be canceled). Wounded characters have their body reduced by 1, unless they bear an armor, helmet or shield. Discard this card if a company has faced the created attack, or if the Dwarf-hold it is placed on leaves play.

card.name: Dwarven Heirlooms
card.text: Dwarf-lord specific. Your starting company may contain non-unique hoard minor items. Additionally, if at a Dwarf-hold you may play a hoard minor item after the successful play of a resource that taps the site (instead of a normal minor item).

card.name: Dwarven Warparty
card.text: Dwarves. 3 strikes (detainment against hero companies). May be played keyed to Angmar, Forochel, Grey Mountain Narrows, Gundabad, High Pass, Iron Hills, Northern Rhovanion, Númeriador, Redhorn Gate, or Withered Heath or to non-Dark-hold [D], non-Shadow-hold [S] sites in these regions. May also keyed to any Dwarf-hold. If Gates of Morning is in play, may also be keyed to any Under-deeps site with a surface a site in the above regions. If Doors of Night is in play, this becomes a normal attack against a hero company, unless it contains a Dwarf.

attr.value: dwarves. 3 strikes (detainment against hero companies). may be played keyed to angmar, forochel, grey mountain narrows, gundabad, high pass, iron hills, northern rhovanion, númeriador, redhorn gate, or withered heath or to non-dark-hold [d], non-shadow-hold [s] sites in these regions. may also keyed to any dwarf-hold. if gates of morning is in play, may also be keyed to any under-deeps site with a surface a site in the above regions. if doors of night is in play, this becomes a normal attack against a hero company, unless it contains a dwarf.

card.name: Dwarven-axe
card.text: Weapon. Warrior only. +2 prowess (to a maximum of 7); +3 prowess if held by a Dwarf (to a maximum of 8).

card.name: Dwarven-galleries
card.text: Dwarf-lord specific. Playable if you have more than 4 P and a Dwarf faction in play. tap: during your end-of-turn phase to take Gnawed Ways, Into Dark Tunnels, or Secret Ways from your play deck or discard pile into hand (reshuffle). Additionally, you receive full mp for To the Uttermost Foundations. Cannot be duplicated by a given player.

card.name: Dworin
card.text: Unique. Firebeard. +2 prowess against Orcs. +1 EI against Dwarves.

card.name: Eagles Ahunt
card.text: Unique. Manifestation of Eagle-watch. Flying. +2 prowess against characters and allies with Flying ability. Each overt company moving through Anduin Vales, Misty Mountains, High Pass or Redhorn Gap faces an attack: Animals. Eagles — each character faces a strike. If Gates of Morning is in play, this attack also affects Dunland, Enedwaith, Gap of Isen and Grey Mountain Narrows. Unless this attack is defeated, any characters in a company facing an attack from Eagles Ahunt cannot use cards requiring scout skill this turn and any ongoing effects of such cards are canceled.

card.name: Floi
card.text: Unique. Ironfist. +1 prowess against Orcs.-1 to all of his CC.-1 to influence checks against factions.

card.name: Flooded to the Surface
card.text: Playable on an Under-deeps surface site if The Reach of Ulmo is in play. The site gains an additional automatic-attack which is an exact duplicate of the first automatic attack of the adjacent Under-deeps site. Cannot be duplicated on a given site.

card.name: Folk of Durin
card.text: Unique. Dwarf-lord specific. Playable at a tapped or untapped Moria if Reconquest of Khazad-dûm is in play and if the influence check is greater than 14. Standard Modifications: Lord of Dwarrowdelf Dwarf (+5), other Dwarves (+2).

card.name: Fortress Reclaimed
card.text: Playable on a site if Rebuild the Town or Hold Rebuild and Repaired is played on it. This card overrides any conflicting hazardor resource. You may play here a non-Dragon, non-animal faction normally playable at a site in the region where target site is located (or adjacent region); the influence attempt is modified by -2. If you have played a faction at this site, an additional automatic-attack is created against other player’s companies: same type as the faction — 3 strikes with 8 prowess (detainment if the company is of the same alignment). Discard this card if Tempest of Fire is played on the site. Cannot be duplicated on a given site.

card.name: Foundations of the Hoard
card.text: Unique. Thráin specific. Playable on Thráin if he bears a Dwarven Ring. You suffer no reduction in item mp at the end of the game, if these are more than half of your mp total. Discard this card if Thráin does not bear a Dwarven Ring.

card.name: Frár
card.text: Unique. Longbeard. +1 prowess against Orcs. -1 to all of his CC.-1 to influence checks against factions. tap: during your organization phase to return any one food-item (e.g. Twice-baked Cakes, Miruvor, etc.) from your discard pile to your play deck (reshuffle).

card.name: Frerin
card.text: Unique. Longbeard. +2 prowess against Orcs. +2 EI against Dwarves. +2 EI against the Blue Mountain Dwarves faction. Any non-stage resource playable on a manifestation of Thorin II may also be played on Frerin, if no manifestation of Thorin II is in play.

card.name: Friendship of Old Renewed
card.text: Unique. Dáin specific. Playable on Dain at Thranduil’s Halls. Dain makes a CC modified by -4. Afterwards, tapp Dain and make an influence check, modified by +3 if you have Wood-elves in play. If the result is greater than 13, this card is worth 1 item mp for each of your unique factions in play (to a maximum of 4). Otherwise discard this card.

card.name: Fungi
card.text: Food item. Playable by a Dwarf or Orc at any tapped or untapped non-Dark-hold [D] Under-deeps site. If the company moves with Under-deeps movement, discard Fungi at the end of the movement/hazard phase to take a second movement/hazard phase; you may untap 1 character in the company.

card.name: Galion
card.text: Unique. Silvan. tap: take Old Winyards from your discard pile into hand.

card.name: Gandalf's Staff
card.text: Unique. Gandalf only. Playable on Wizard’s Staff, if you discard a Reforging from the company. tap: give Gandalf +2 to prowess and body against a strike. tap: reduce his company’s hazard limit by 1 (to a minimum of 1). Gandalf makes a CC.

card.name: Gimli's Axe
card.text: Unique. Playable on a Dwarven-axe borne by any manifestation of Gimli. +1 to prowess (to no maximum). You may always assign strikes to Gimli regardless of his status. Discard if the axe is not borne by a manifestation of Gimli.

card.name: Gimli, Son of Gloin
card.text: Unique. Manifestation of Gimli. Longbeard. +1 prowess against Orcs. +1 prowess when Hunting Orcs is in play (+2 if in company with an Elf).

card.name: Glades of Flowering Stone
card.text: Dwarf-lord specific. Playable if your Dwarf- lord is at Glittering Caves and you have a Gems of Arda in play. Glittering Caves becomes a Dwarf-hold and all versions of the Gem-deeps become a Border-hold [B]. Replace all automatic-attacks with: Dwarves — 3 strikes at 8 prowess (detainment against hero companies). Cannot be duplicated.

card.name: Glorin
card.text: Unique. Ironfist. Agent. +1 prowess against Orcs and Men.

card.name: Goblin-basher
card.text: Unique. Grey Agent. Manifestation of Beorn. +2 prowess against Orcs. -1 to his CC. Agent only: may attack an overt company normally at a Shadow-hold [S] during the site phase. If an Orc, Wolf or Animal hazard creature is played on a company at or moving to a site in his current or adjacent region, you may automatically transfer him to this site (even you have the site in active play).

card.name: Gollum's Cave
card.text: Playable on an agent. Target agent may move to Under-deeps sites. Return the agent to its owner’s hand if this card leaves play. Cannot be duplicated on a given agent.

card.name: Great Achievement
card.text: Place this card on your avatar if he is in play. All cards that could be stored at a Haven [H] can be stored at one of your Havens. If on your avatar, one of the following cards is worth full mp if played successfully (then this card is worth 1 mp): Clean the Greenwood, Fate of the Ithil-stone, Into the Smoking Cone, King under the Mountain, Reconquest of Khazad-dûm, Pass the Doors of Dol Guldur, The Wood of Greenleaves, Towers Destroyed, or Tower Raided.

card.name: Great Miners
card.text: Dwarf-lord specific. Playable if you have at least 5 P and a Protected Lordhaven. You receive full mp for Mithril, Map to Mithril, Vein of Arda, Gems of Arda, and The Arkenstone. If you have 5 copies of these cards in played you receive this card’s mp. Cannot be duplicated by a given player.

card.name: Halls of Khazad-dûm
card.text: Playable during the site phase on Moria, if you have Return to Khazad-dûm is in play and the company contains a majority of Dwarves. The company faces 3 attacks (cannot be canceled): Orcs — 5 strikes with 8 prowess; Orcs — 3 strikes with 11 prowess; Troll — 1 strike with 14 prowess; Following the attacks, tTatap a Dwarf with mind 5 or greater or discard this card. Discard any Invade Their Domain played on Moria. Moria becomes a Border-hold [B] and loses its Orc automatic- attacks. A Balrog player may play Invade their Domain on Moria (none of the attacks may be canceled). If successfully played this card is discarded.Discard if the site leaves active play. Cannot be duplicated.

card.name: Hard to Tame
card.text: Playable on a ring special item or a treasure borne by a Dwarf. The item gives 1 less CP. Any opponent may tap this card to take Greed or Covetous Thoughts from his discard pile into hand (costing 1 hazard). Discard this card if the item is not borne by a Dwarf.

card.name: Heladil
card.text: Unique. Silvan. +2 prowess against Spiders. +1 EI against the Wood-elves faction. Discard a Greenwood the Great from the company to heal Heladil.

card.name: Hermit Troll
card.text: Troll. 1 strike. May also be played keyed to a Ruins & Lairs [R] that has at least 2 Wilderness [w] or 1 Desert [e] in its site path.

card.name: His Beard Long and Forked
card.text: Playable on a Dwarf character with a mind of 5 or more. Target character becomes a leader (if not already) and may tap to untap a Dwarf in his company. You may start the game with this card in lieu of a minor item.

card.name: Hoard Gathering
card.text: Choose 1 of the following item types when you play this card: Treasure, Magic Ring, Dwarven Ring or Greater Hoard Item. This card is worth 3 mp, if you have stored at least 3 items of the chosen type. Cannot be duplicated by a given player.

card.name: Hunting Orcs
card.text: Each player may take a Wondrous Maps from discard pile or sideboard into hand during end-of-turn phase. Additionally, Wondrous Maps can be played if the last region is a Dark-domain [d] or a Wilderness [w]. Cannot be duplicated.

card.name: Ibûn
card.text: Unique. Undead. Dwarf. 1 strike. May also be played keyed to a Ruins & Lairs [R] that has at least 2 Wilderness [w] in its site path. May also be played keyed to Bar-en-Ibûn.

attr.value: Dwarf-lord specific. This site is a protected Lordhaven. If any of your companies is at this site, all attacks against it are canceled and you receive the stage point. Characters heal here as if in a normal Haven.

card.name: Ironfoot
card.text: Unique. Boots. Place this card on Daín if heis in play. +1 body to a maximum of 10.If on Dain: tap: +2 prowess against a strike from an Animal, Orc, or Wolf attack. tap: during your end-of-turn phase to search your play deck (shuffle) or discard pile for a Leg it Double Quick.

card.name: Khazadshatur
card.text: Unique. Helmet. Playable at Goblin-gate. Dwarf only: +1 EI against Dwarves. +2 body to a maximum of 9. All dark enchantments targeting bearer are cancelled. tap: give +3 prowess against a strike for which weapons do not modify, or to modify a roll by +3 against a strike for which the prowess is not used to determine the result.

card.name: King of the Seven Houses
card.text: Dwarf-lord specific. Playable on your Dwarf-lord at 1 of your Lord-havens [H], if bearing The One Ring. Only 1 King of Seven Houses may be played on a given turn. If at a Lord-haven during your end-of-turn phase and bearing The One Ring, opponent may search his play deck or discard pile for up to 3 Nazgûl or Maia hazards creatures, which attack your Dwarf-lord as if a single character company (cannot be canceled). If unwounded after the attacks, make a roll: add 1 for each King of the Seven Houses you have in play. If the result is less than 5, your Dwarf-lord is eliminated; if greater than 8, you win the game.

card.name: King's Advisor
card.text: +1 prowess against Orcs. Cannot be duplicated on a given company. tap: take His Beard Long and Forked from your discard pile to hand.

card.name: King's Judge
card.text: +1 prowess against Orcs. +1 EI against Dwarves. +3 EI against Dwarf factions. Cannot be duplicated on a given company.

card.name: Kingdom under the Mountain
card.text: Playable if you have either, Halls of Khazad-dûm, King under the Mountain or Return to Old Dwellings in play. +4 to your GI. You may bring 1 copy of the following cards into your playdeck from your sideboard, when this card is played: Hoard Gathering, No Strangers at this Time, and Profitable Trade. The region containing the site used for the play of either of the above mentioned cards becomes a Border-land [b]. Reduce this card’s mp by the total mp of factions and miscellanious cards in play at sites in the same territory by opponents. Discard this card if it is ever worth less than 1 mp. A Dwarf-lord player receives full mp for this card. Cannot be duplicated on a given player.

card.name: Knowledge of Earth's Treasures
card.text: Dwarf-lord specific. Playable on a Dwarf-lord bearing a Dwarven Ring. tap: during your end-of-turn phase to take Vein of Arda, Gems of Arda or Mithril from your discard pile or play deck (reshuffle) to your hand. Dwarf-lord makes a CC modified by +2. Discard this card if bearer does not bear a Dwarven Ring. Cannot be duplicated by a given player.

card.name: Kori
card.text: Unique. Ironfist. Grey Agent. +1 prowess against Orcs and Trolls. May move with Under-deeps movement. Agent only: tap: at a company’s new site to create an additional automatic-attack: Traps — 2 strikes with 9 prowess.tap: during movement/hazard phase, if at a company’s new site, to prevent that company from moving again this turn.

card.name: Last of the Seven
card.text: Thráin specific. As a short-event can only be played if no Dwarven Ring is in play; Thráin receives +2 prowess, +1 body, +2 EI for the rest of the turn, and you may keep 1 more card than normal in your hand. Thráin makes a CC modified by -1. As a permanent-event, playable if Thráin is bearing a Dwarven Ring: it gives -3 mp and -3 CP. Discard if Thráin is not bearing a Dwarven Ring. Thráin makes a CC during untap phase for every other Dwarven ring in play; the ring he bears now gives full CP, but if failing the CC you must discard a lower mind character in his company (ignore other effects).

card.name: Lipór
card.text: Unique. Longbeard. +2 prowess against Orcs. May play Knowledge of the Enemy at any site after facing an Orc attack during the site phase.

card.name: Lock nor Bar May Hinder
card.text: Playable during organization phase on a company with a character controlling Rescue Prisoners. You may play a character with the company from hand or discard pile. This may be done in addition to any other character played or discarded during this organization phase.

attr.value: Swamp. *Major items are playable at the site, if the company has faced anUndead creature keyed to the site this turn.
Swamp. *Major items are playable at the site, if the company has faced anUndead creature keyed to the site this turn.

card.name: Loni
card.text: Unique. Ironfist. +1 prowess against Orcs.-1 to all of his CC.-1 to influence checks against factions. +1 to all rolls required for Loni’s company to move to adjacent Under-deeps sites.

card.name: Looking Forward
card.text: Playable during the organization phase on your Wizard or Lord. Tap your Wizard or Lord to look at the top 7 cards of any play deck. Return these cards to the top of the play deck in any order you choose.

card.name: Lord of Dwarrowdelf
card.text: Unique. Dwarf-lord specific. Playable on your Dwarf-lord, if he is at Moria and you have at least 10 P. He receives +5 EI against Dwarves. If you have Reconquest of Khazad- dûm in play, you receive full mp for it and also for Return to Khazad-dûm and Halls of Khazad-dûm. Unless a manifestation of The Balrog of Moria has been defeated, discard this card if bearer ever moves outside Redhorn Gap or its adjacent regions or is not at Moria or its adjacent sites.

card.name: Lord of the Eagles
card.text: Unique. Animal. Flying. Manifestation of Gwaihir. 3 strikes. Attacker chooses defending characters. As a creature playable keyed to Anduin Vales, High Pass, Western Mirkwood, Wold & Foothills or Woodland Realm, or at site in these regions. If Doors of Night is not in play, may also be played keyed to Shadow-lands [s] and Shadow-holds [S]. May only be played against minion and Dragon-lord companies. As a short-event, bring any non-unique hazard creature marked with an (*) from your discard pile to your hand.

card.name: Lust for Treasure
card.text: Thranduil specific. Playable if an opponent has a ring or treasure item in play. Take up to 3 treasure items from sideboard and handthem to your oppenent, who then places them face down under 3 different Dragon’s Lairs and/or Dwarf-holds in Wilderland (from either location deck, opponent’s choice). These items are considered playable by any player at the site, after facing all automatic-attacks. You receive 1 mp for each of these items stored at Thranduil’s Halls. Cannot be duplicated.

card.name: Ninevet
card.text: Animal. 1 strike. May also be played keyed to a Swamp or on a company moving with Port-on-River movement. If Terror from the Deeps is in play, may also be played keyed to any Under-deeps site.

card.name: Mighty Was the Fallen
card.text: Playable on a character with a mp value of 2or more, after that character is wounded and before the body check is made. If the character is eliminated by the body check, place this card in your mp pile. Otherwise discard this card.

card.name: Dwarf-miner
card.text: +1 prowess against Orcs and Trolls. -1 to all of his CC. -1 to influence checks against factions. +1 to all rolls required for his company to move to adjacent Under-deeps sites. Cannot be duplicated on a given company.

card.name: Miner's Pick
card.text: Weapon. +1 to the company’s roll to move to any Under-deeps site. +1 prowess to a maximum of 4. A Hobbit cannot use this item.

attr.value: Dwarves — 3 strikes with 10 prowess (detainment if the company contains a Dwarf majority)
Dual-site. Contains a hoard. Hidden site. *You may move to this site from any Wonderous Maps site in Nurn or Horse Plains. Dwarven Warparty may be played keyed to this site.

card.name: Mining Settlement
card.text: Dwarf-lord specific. Playable during the site phase on a non-Dragon’s lair Ruins & Lairs [R] in a region adjacent to a mountain range; the site must normally be a Ruins & Lairs [R]. Site becomes a Dwarf-hold and one of your Lordhavens [H] and the automatic-attacks are replaced with: Dwarves — 3 strikes with 9 prowess. Nothing is considered playable as written on the site card. If one of your companies is at this site, all attacks against it are canceled. Other alignments may not use this site as a Haven [H]. Discard this card when the site is discarded or returned to the location deck. It cannot be discarded otherwise. Alternatively, you may play this card on any Dwarf-hold: the site becomes a Protected Lordhaven [H].

card.name: Mithrandir
card.text: Unique. Manifestation of Gandalf. Playable on a non-overt company without avatar, if you are a Wizard or Lord with less than 10 P. You may play spells and ring tests with the company (no CC or tapping required). If the company moves to a Shadow-hold [S] or Dark-hold [D], opponent must reveal 2random cards from hand.Discard if Gandalf enters play, or you have 10 P ormore. Rotate this card 90° during your end-of-turn phase, discard when rotated 360°.

card.name: More Than Meets the Eye
card.text: Dwarf-lord specific. If played as starting stage card, your starting company may include Hobbits. All your Hobbit characters, allies and factions are worth full mp. Your Dwarf-lord receives +4 EI against Hobbits. Once per turn you may play a Hobbit at his home site (even from your discard pile) if you tap either 2 Hobbits or 4 Dwarves at the site. Cannot be duplicated on a given player.

card.name: Mornaugrim
card.text: Unique. Playable at Angûrath if the influence check is greater then 10.Standart Modifications: Any Orc faction (-4), Dwarves (+3), any overt character (-4)This faction is worth 3 mp if you also control a Dwarven Ring. tap: bring a Dark-forges or The Iron-pit from your discard-pile to your play deck.

card.name: Mountaineer
card.text: +1 prowesss against Orcs. -1 to all of his CC.-1 to influence checks against factions. tap: at the end of the organization phase to allow his company to move as if two regions separated by a mountain range were adjacent. Cannot be duplicated on a given company.

card.name: Náin, Son of Grór
card.text: Unique. Longbeard. +1 prowess against Orcs. +2 EI against Dwarves.

card.name: Náli
card.text: Unique. Longbeard. +1 prowess against Orcs.-1 to all of his CC. -3 to influence checks against factions.

card.name: Narin
card.text: Unique. Ironfist. +2 prowess against Orcs. +2 EI against Dwarves. If controlling Dwarven Ring of Thélor’s Tribe: +1 to all his CC and he becomes a leader.

card.name: Naugol
card.text: As a creature: Dwarves 3 strikes.+2 prowess against Orcs. Playable keyed to any Dwarf-hold or any version of any site where a Dwarf-lord is present. As a long-event: All attack from Ride against the Enemies snf/or Old Enemies when using a Dwarf character or faction receives +1 strikes and +1 prowess and chooses defending Orc characters. Cannot be duplicated.

card.name: Naugrim
card.text: All Dwarf attacks receive +1 prowess and +1 body; Dwarf attacks with no body have 5 body. Discard this card if a Dwarf attack is defeated. Cannot be duplicated.

card.name: No Mouse Unnoticed
card.text: Unique. Balin specific. Place this card on Balinif in play. If on Balin, he may make a CC to force an on-guard card played against his company to be revealed.

card.name: Norin
card.text: Unique. Ironfist. +2 prowess against Men, Orcs and Trolls.

card.name: Not Badly Off
card.text: Unique. Thorin specific. Playable if you have A Good Bit Laid By in play and have stored a greater item at Blue Mountain Dwarf-hold. All your Dwarves at Blue Mountain Dwarf-hold receive +1 to any CC and may not be returned to your hand or discarded.

card.name: Not without a Plan
card.text: Non-unique Orc creatures can be keyed to Under-deeps Ruins & Lairs [R] and Under- deeps Shadow-holds [S]. Additionally, if Doors of Night is in play, non-unique Orc creatures can be keyed to surface sites of any Under-deeps site.

attr.value: Dwarves — each character faces a strike with 7 prowess (detainment; canceled if the company contains only Dwarves)
character may join the company (if enough influence is available to control him).
Dwarves — 4 strikes with 10 prowess (detainment if the company contains a Dwarf)
You may discard a Treasure from a covert company at this site to cancel the automatic-attack.

card.name: Oakenshield
card.text: Unique. Shield. Place this card on Thorin II if he is in play. +1 body to a maximum of 10. If on Thorin II: tap: allow Thorin to face a strike from an attack against his company regardless of the attack’s normal abilities or his status. tap: during your end-of-turn phase to take Block from your play deck (shuffle) or discard pile into hand.

card.name: Old Enemies
card.text: Playable on a hero faction in play. Each overt company moving through the region containing the site where the faction was played, or a region adjacent to this one, faces an attack: same type as the faction, with a number of strikes equal to the faction’s mp value. Each strike has a prowess of 10 and body of 7. If the attack is defeated, discard the faction. Cannot be duplicated on a given faction.

card.name: Old Grudge
card.text: All Dwarves in play receive +1 prowess against Orcs, Trolls, Dragons and Drakes. Discard this card when any attack of this type is defeated by a company containing a least 1 Dwarf. Cannot be duplicated.

card.name: Orc Archers
card.text: Playable on an Orc attack before strikes are assigned; does not count against the hazard limit. Each character faces a strike with 6 prowess; prowess against this strike cannot be modified, but character receives +1 prowess for each armor, helmet, and/or shield he bears and is able to use. Strikes from Orc Archers are never detainment, regardless of the company, site, region, or region-type on which they are played.

card.name: Orc-tortured
card.text: Playble on a character facing a strike from an Orc attack. If the strike is successful, he is not harmed and is taken prisoner at a Dark-hold [D], Shadow-hold [S], or Ruins & Lairs [R] (in the same or adjacent region). At the start of each of his untap phases, make a body check for that character. Rescue-attacks (2): Orcs — 2 strikes with 7 prowess, Orcs— 1 strikes with 10 prowess.

card.name: Orcish Marauders
card.text: Orcs. 2 strikes. If all strikes against a moving company are successful, tap the company's new site.

card.name: Origin of Stone
card.text: Command. Playable during the organization phase on a Dwarf-leader. Return all other command cards on target leader to your hand when this card is played. -2 to leader’s EI (to a minimum of 0) and +1 prowess to all Dwarves in his company. +1 to your under-deep movement rolls. You may return this card to your hand during your organization phase.

card.name: Out of Practise
card.text: Playable on a non-Hobbit character with 2 or more skills. Target character must move to a different site each turn or tap at the end of the organization phase. taTap another character in the same company during the organization phase to attempt to remove this card by making a roll: if the result is greater than 7, discard this card. Cannot be duplicated on a given character.

card.name: Pale Enchanted Gold
card.text: Hoard Item. Treasure. Playable at any tapped or untapped site containing a hoard. Discard to cancel any attack by Men or Dwarves against bearer’s company; or to give +3 to an influence attempt against a Man or Dwarf character or faction. Dragon-sickness may be played on the bearer of this item.

card.name: Pathfinder
card.text: +1 prowess against Orcs. -1 to all of his CC.-1 to influence checks against factions. tap: cancel a Drake, Orc or Troll attack keyed to Wilderness [w] (by type or name). Cannot be duplicated on a given company.

card.name: Pipe
card.text: tTap a non-Elf bearer during your end-of-turn phase and make a CC to bring one Smoke Rings, Longbottom Leaf or Old Toby from your discard pile to your play deck (reshuffle). If bearer is Gandalf or Saruman you may take one of these cards to your hand instead.

card.name: Pipe Weed
card.text: Playable on an untapped Wizard, Dwarf or non-Elf character with a home site in Eriador. Tap the character. You may look at the top 5 cards of your deck and place them back on top in any order you chose. Character makes a CC modified by -2 (Hobbits at -4).

card.name: Pit-trap
card.text: Playable on-guard on a company at a Dwarf-hold or Dark-hold [D], or any Shadow-hold [S] with a Spawn or Orc automatic-attack. Make a roll and add 1 for every Avatar and scout in the company; if the result is less than 10, a character with the same random number as the result (hazard player’s choice) faces an attack: Trap — 1 strike with 14 prowess; weapons do not modify and cannot be canceled, but character receives +1 to his prowess if he bears any armor, helmet or shield (only 1 item of the same type may be applied). Any following bodycheck is modified by +1.

card.name: Pity Mixed with Horror
card.text: Playable on a character. Make a CC for each corruption card played on the character, discard the corruption card after a successfull CC. This card may also be played as a hazard.

card.name: Pocket-handkerchief
card.text: May not be included with a starting company, unless it contains a Hobbit. Discard this item to cancel any effect that would discard the bearer or return him to your hand.

card.name: Promise of Treasure
card.text: Dwarf-lord specific. Playable on a non-avatar Dwarf in your Dwarf-lord’s company (or in your starting company). +1 to his mind and +1 to his CC. Discard if bearer transfers an item to another character.Cannot be duplicated on a given character.

card.name: Ravens of Northern Rhovanion
card.text: Unique. Playable at any site in Northern Rhovanion if the influence check is greater than 8. Standard Modifications: if Roäc the Raven or Carc is in the company (+3). tap: give +2 to an influence check against any hero faction playable at sites in Northern Rhovanion, Southern Rhovanion, Dorwinion and Iron Hills.

card.name: Reconquest of Khazad-dûm
card.text: Playable if you have Halls of Khazad-dûm in play. The automatic-attack created by Balrog of Moria receives 9 body. If one of your companies defeats a manifestation of Balrog of Moria, this card is worth 5 mp, and all versions of Moria become a Free-hold [F] and a Dwarf-hold; replace all automatic- attacks with: Dwarves — 4 strikes with 10 prowess (detainment against hero companies; this attack is canceled against your companies). Cannot be duplicated.

attr.value: no surface site, The Pits of Angband (4), The Drowning-deeps (9)
(1st) Drake — 2 strikes with 12 prowess; (2nd) Opponent may play as an automatick-attack 1 hazard creature from his hand normally keyed to Coastal Seas [c]
Creatures keyed to Coastal Seas [x]c] may be keyed to this site.
no surface site, The Pits of Angband (5), The Drowning-deeps (9)
(1st) Drake — 2 strikes with 12 prowess; (2nd) Opponent may play as an automatick-attack 1 hazard creature from his hand normally keyed to Coastal Seas [c]
Creatures keyed to Coastal Seas [x]c] may be keyed to this site.

card.name: Return to Khazad-dûm
card.text: Playable during the site phase on a company at Moria containing a majority of Dwarves. The company faces 2 attacks: Orcs — 5 strikes with 8 prowess; Trolls — 1 strike with 12 prowess. Following the attacks, ttap a Dwarf with mind 5 or greater or discard this card. Cannot be duplicated by a given player.

card.name: Return to Old Dwellings
card.text: Playble during the site phase at (Andoloki?), Carn Dûm, Celeb-ost, Mount Gundabad,

card.name: Returned to its Owner
card.text: Place this card with a Dwarf-hold you have in play. Any items stored there yield mp as if held by a Dwarf. Discard if the site leaves play or is returned to the location deck.

card.name: Ring of Invisibility
card.text: Unique. Manifestation of The One Ring. Playable only at the Under-grottos. Bearer may make a CC to cancel a strike from a non-Nazgûl, non-Undead attack against himself. Discard this ring when tested. If tested, obtain a random value to determine which ring card may be immediately played: The One Ring (8,9,10,11,12+); a Magic Ring (1,2,3,4,5,6,7), a Lesser Ring (any result). This card is considered The One Ring for purposes of interpreting card text on any manifestation of Gollum.

card.name: River Running
card.text: Scout only. Playable on a moving company containing an untapped scout at the end of the organization phase. Tap the scout. Unless the company’s site path contains a Dark-domain [d] or a Coastal Sea [c], Enchanted Stream or River cannot be played against the company or on its new site.

attr.value: Blue Mountain Dwarf-hold (8), Ruins of Nogrod (6), The Drowning-deeps (12)

(1st) Traps — 3 strikes with 9 prowess —weapons do not modify, cannot be canceled— (2nd) Opponent may play as an automatic-attack 1 non-unique hazard creature from his hand normally keyed to Shadow-hold [S]
Blue Mountain Dwarf-hold (11), Ruins of Nogrod (7), The Drowning-deeps (11)

(1st) Traps — 3 strikes with 9 prowess —weapons do not modify, cannot be canceled— (2nd) Opponent may play as an automatic-attack 1 non-unique hazard creature from his hand normally keyed to Shadow-hold [S]
Blue Mountain Dwarf-hold (8), Ruins of Belegost (6), The Drowning-deeps (12)

(1st) Traps — 4 strikes with 10 prowess —weapons do not modify, cannot be canceled— (2nd) Opponent may play as an automatic-attack 1 non-unique hazard creature from his hand normally keyed to Shadow-hold [S]
Blue Mountain Dwarf-hold (11), Ruins of Belegost (7), The Drowning-deeps (11)

(1st) Traps — 4 strikes with 10 prowess —weapons do not modify, cannot be canceled— (2nd) Opponent may play as an automatic-attack 1 non-unique hazard creature from his hand normally keyed to Shadow-hold [S]

card.name: Shimmer of Hope
card.text: Playable on a company at an Under-deeps surface site, which is a Ruins & Lairs [R], Shadow-hold [S] or Dark-hold [D]. The company may either move an additional region when leaving the site, or discard as many corruption cards on characters in the company as there are strikes in the site’s first automatic-attack. Cannot be duplicated on a given turn.

card.name: Soldiers of the Dark Lord
card.text: All Orc hazard creatures gain +1 strike (+2 if Shadow of Mordor is in play) and may be played keyed to Shadow-hold [S], Dark- domain [d] or Dark-hold [D]. Discard this card at the end of a movement/ hazard phase in which an Orc hazard creature was defeated, or when Shadow of Mordor leaves play. Cannot be duplicated.

card.name: Son of Dáin
card.text: Unique. Dwarf-lord specific. Place this card on Thorin III Stonehelm if he is in play. tap: during your end-of-turn phase (if on Thorin III Stonehelm) to take a Dwarf character from your discard pile into hand.

card.name: Son of Fundin
card.text: Unique. Balin specific. Place this card on Balin if in play. tap: during your your end-of-turn phase (if on Balin) to take Return to Khazad-dûm, Lord of Dwarrowdelf or a Dwarf character from your discard pile to your hand.

card.name: Son of Nain
card.text: Unique. Dáin specific. Place this card on Dain if he is in play.tap: during your end-of-turn phase to take Mining Settlement, Strength from the Iron Hills or a Dwarf character from discard pile to hand.

card.name: Son of Thráin
card.text: Unique. Thorin specific. Place this card on Thorin if in play. If this is a starting stage card, 1 of your starting minor items may be Thrór’s Map. tap: during your end-of-turn phase (if on Thorin) to take King under the Mountain, Old Prejudice or a Dwarf character from discard pile to hand.

card.name: Son of Thrór
card.text: Unique. Thráin specific. Place this card on Thráin if in play. tap: during your end-of-turn phase (if on Thráin) to take Last of the Seven, Lord of Dwarrowdelf, or Test of Fire from discard pile to hand.

attr.value: Information, Items* (minor, major, greater**) *—only if the company discard a Lost Knowledge card it controls— **—non-unique battle-gear items only—
Information, Items (minor, major**) *—only if Gates of Morning or Doors of Night is in play **—only if Sun or Moon is in play

card.name: Strength from the Iron Hills
card.text: Unique. Dáin specific. If you have a Dwarf faction in play, attacks from Ahunt Dragon manifestations against your companies receive 1 less strike after all other modifiers (no minimum).

card.name: Swordmaster
card.text: Sage only. Playable on an untapped sage at an untapped site where Information is playable during site phase. Tap the site and the sage. Gives the sage warrior skill. If the sage is already a warrior, he can use 2weapons (both modifiers count). If he uses 2 weapons, he can not use a shield. Cannot be duplicated on a given character.

card.name: Ta-Fa-Lisch
card.text: Undead. 3 strikes. Playable at any non-Haven [H] site containing a hoard. Unless the attack is canceled or defeated, place this card with the site to which it was keyed. Place Ta-fa-lisch with the first character to play an item at the site. Character faces an attack from this creature at the start of every movement/hazard phase (as if a single character company, not counting against the hazard limit) until it is defeated or the item it was transfered with is stored or leaves play (then remove this card from the game).

card.name: Tarin
card.text: Unique. Firebeard. Agent. +1 prowess against Orcs and Elves. Agent only: tap: discard an item stored at (or placed with) his current site. May move to any Dwarf-hold (even if a Protected Lord-haven H).

card.name: Terror from the Deeps
card.text: Any non-Man creature that can be keyed to Costal Sea [c] may be keyed to Lindon, Arthedain, Cardolan, Andrast, Enedwaith, Anfalas, Lebennin, Harondor and Hyarmenfalas. Discard this card when such a creature keyed to one of these regions by name is defeated, or when any play deck is exhausted.

card.name: The Back Door
card.text: Playable on a company moving through a region, which borders on 2 different mountain ranges. For each non-scout, non-ranger character in the company, 1 non-unique Orc hazard creature may be played regardless of region-type restrictions and not counting against the hazard limit.

attr.value: Lord of the Carrock may always be played at this site against an overt company, regardless of any other cards in play
you may play Eagle Mounts here as if at Eagles Eyrie.
Blue Mountain Dwarf-hold (10), Remains of Thangorodrim (10), Ruins of Belegost (11), Ruins of Nogrod (11), The Under-vaults (9),

Creatures keyed to Coastal Sea [c] and Drakeskeyed to sites in a Coastal Sea region may be keyed tothis site.

(1st) Drake — 2 strikes with 11 prowess; (2nd) Opponent may play as an automatic-attack 1 non-unique hazard creature from his hand normally keyed to CoastalSeas [c].
Creatures keyed to Coastal Sea [c] and Drakeskeyed to sites in a Coastal Sea region may be keyed to this site.

card.name: The Pack at the Door
card.text: Playable if Doors of Night is in play. Each non-unique Animal, Spider and Wolf creature may be played in Border-lands [b], Border-holds [[B] or Ruins & Lairs [R]. The creature must be playable in a non-Coastal Sea [c] region.

attr.value: Iron Hill Dwarf-hold (8), The Wind-deeps (9), Vaults of Utûmno (12)
(1st) Drake — 2 strikes with 11 prowess; (2nd) Opponent may play as an automatic-attack 1 non- unique hazard creature from his hand normally keyed to a Shadow-hold [S]
Any Dragon creature playable keyed to a site in Wilderland may be keyed to this site.
Iron Hill Dwarf-hold (14), The Wind-deeps (9), Vaults of Utûmno (11)
(1st) Drake — 2 strikes with 11 prowess; (2nd) Opponent may play as an automatic- attack 1 non- unique hazard creature from his hand normally keyed to a Shadow-hold [S]
Any Dragon creature playable keyed to a site in Wilderland may be keyed to this site.

card.name: The Seven Houses
card.text: Unique. Dwarf-lord specific. Playable if you have at least 7 P. , tap: play a non-unique Dwarf from your discard pile or sideboard (not counting against the 1 character per turn limit), or take a Dwarf faction from the discard pile to your hand. If you have 3 Dwarf factions in play, all your unique Dwarf factions are worth 4 mp. Cannot be duplicated by a given player.

card.name: The Watchful Peace
card.text: Hazard creatures which are manifestations of a Wizard or Elf-lord may be keyed to Border-land [b], Border-hold [B], Wilderness [w] or Ruins & Lairs [R] against minion or overt companies. Additionally, if Doors of Night is not in play, each player may take 1 Maia permanent- event from his discard pile into hand during end-of-turn phase. Cannot be duplicated.

attr.value: The Wind Throne (0), The Rusted-deeps (9), The Under-leas (6),
(1st) Orcs (1st attack) — 3 strikes with 7 prowess; (2nd) Opponent may play as an automatic- attack 1 non- unique hazard creature from his hand normally keyed to a Shadow-hold [S]
Any non-unique Drake creature playablekeyed to a site or region in Wilderland may be keyed to this site.
The Wind Throne (0), The Rusted-deeps (9), The Under-leas (6)
(1st) Orcs — 3 strikes with 7 prowess; (2nd) Opponent may play as an automatic-attack 1 non- unique hazard creature from his hand normally keyed to a Shadow-hold [S]
Any non-unique Drake creature playablekeyed to a site or region in Wilderland may bekeyed to thissite.

card.name: This Cannot Be Borne!
card.text: Unique. Dwarf-lord specific. Playable on your Dwarf-lord if you have at least 12 P, 1 Dwarf faction, The Seven Houses, Clad for War and 6 Dwarf characters in play. tap: when your Dwarf-lord is at Moria during the site phase, after defeating all automatic-attacks; this card does not untap normally. If tapped, your next influence attempt against a Dwarf faction, Dwarf character, or ally or item controlled by a Dwarf is automatically successful. Place this card in your mp pile after making such an influence attempt, it is worth 5 mp.

card.name: Thorin
card.text: Unique. Manifestation of Thorin II. Longbeard. +3 prowess against Orcs, +1 prowess against Trolls. +2 EI against Dwarves. If you are Thorin, all cards playable at or on Moria are worth full mp; you may keep 1 more card then normal in your hand if Reconquest of Khazad-dûm is in play. If King under the Mountain is played on him, he receives full mp for it and when at the site where the Dragon was defeated you may keep 1 more card than normal in your hand. -3 mp if eliminated.

card.name: Thorin III Stonehelm
card.text: Unique. Longbeard. +1 prowess against Orcs and Wolves. +2 EI against Dwarves. Any resource playable on a manifestation of Dáin II may also be played on Thorin III Stonehelm, if any manifestation of Dain II is eliminated.

card.name: Thráin
card.text: Unique. Manifestation of Thráin II. Longbeard. +1 prowess against Orcs, Trolls, Drakes and Dragons. +3 EI against Dwarves. If you are Thráin, all items playable at The Lonely Mountain are worth full mp. If King under the Mountain is played on him it is worth full mp, and when at the site where the Dragon was defeated you may keep 1 more card than normal in hand. If The Lord of Dwarrowdelf is played on him and he is at Moria, you may keep 1 more card than normal in hand. -3 mp if eliminated.

card.name: Threat of many Feet
card.text: Does not count against the hazard limit. While this card is in play, every moving company’s site path includes the site being left. Cannot be duplicated.

card.name: Three Guesses
card.text: When making a riddling roll, make 3 rolls modified by -2 and choose any of the results to use. May also be played during opponent’s site phase.

card.name: Tupór
card.text: Unique. Firebeard. +1 prowess against Orcs and Wolves. +1 EI against Dwarves.

card.name: Warhammer
card.text: Weapon. Two-handed. Warrior only: +2 prowess to a maximum of 8 (+3 against Trolls to a maximum of 9, if borne by a Dwarf).

card.name: We Must Away!
card.text: Playable at the end of the organization phase on a moving hero company with at least 2 Dwarf characters. Untap all characters in the company. The company may move an additional region this turn (to a maximum of 6). Cannot be duplicated on a given company.

card.name: What have I got in my Pocket?
card.graphics: What have I got in my Pocket.jpg
card.text: Riddling Attempt. Playable during the site phase on a character at the same site as one of opponent’s companies. Tap the character. Opponent chooses a character from his company for this riddling attempt. Each player makes a riddling roll modified by +2 if his character is a sage and by +1 if a Hobbit (re-roll ties). The player with the highest result wins: he names an item (not a unique item already in play) and the other player reveals his hand. If the item is revealed, the winner may immediately play that item with the riddling character from hand or discard pile; loser discards the revealed item.

card.name: Without a Glance of Longing
card.text: Playable on a company during the organization phase. All corruption checks made this organization phase resulting from attempts to transfer or store items or permanent-events are modified by +2 (including CC incurred through Lure of Expedience).

card.name: Wyrmsiege
card.text: Playable on a Border-hold [B] or Free-hold [F] in the Northern Waste or Wilderland. Siege may not be played or be in play on the site. Place a non-unique Drake with this card or discard it: all companies at this site must face an attack by the attached Drake creature at the beginning of their site phase. At the end of the organization phase, a company at this site must make a roll and subtract 1 from the result for every non-ranger character it contains: if the result is less than 6, the company may not move this turn. Discard this card when the site is discarded or returned to the location deck, or when the attached creature is defeated.
